name: Android Attack
overview: Android Attack is a simple Berzerk clone which bears no resemblance to similarly named games for other 8-bit computers. Advertising copy reads: The nuclear reactor in our top-secret installation has malfunctioned and is in danger of melting down! You've been chosen to go in and manually release the cooling water. Now only one problem remains - there isn't time to deactive the Security Androids guarding the unmanned installation, so you'll have to fight your way in, release the water, then escape before the entire underground laboratory fills with water! If you survive this mission, we've got another for you, only this time there are more levels to get through and the Androids are meaner!
